title: UNICEF: the first forty years
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Nutrition

description: Presents a comprehensive history of UNICEF since its formation in 1946 to the present day. Catalogues its worth in the developing countries and indicates its success in various projects to improve the health, nutrition and social development of millions of people. No other credits available.
